name: The Hourglass Affair
description:
The Hourglass Affair is a story-based puzzle platformer made for the 2020.2 Brackeys’ Game Jam in 7 days, with the theme “Rewind”.

Synopsis:
The Hourglass Artifact is an infamous treasure hidden under the depths and mazes within the Temple of Time. No intruder has ever reached very far, until today. Help Agent Noon on his mission through the Temple of Time and encounter some unique characters and puzzles. Stop the intruder from reaching the Artifact before it’s too late!

Controls:
Use the WASD or Arrow keys to move Agent Noon.
Press Q to interact with characters and items.

Credts:
Code: Bouzgaou, Smerelo, The210, Ashkan
Art: Elaine (@poddlesli)

We encountered some bugs. WebGL version: puzzles working fairly well, but the ending is not integrated. Windows version: a glitch in the second level, with an ending.
